website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for most types of fungal skin afflictions, but others on our list are just as effective and more versatile for a lower price.
pros: Contains 1% Terbinafine Hydrochloride that's highly effective for treating athletes' feet
cons: Comes at a slightly higher price for a 1-oz

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled product. Only a single 1 oz tube was received for $13
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. I'm not reviewing the effectiveness of the product but rather, the product description. The product I purchased was sold as "1 ounce (Pack of 2)" and cost around $12. What I received was a single 1 oz tube. I believe the price I paid is accurate for what I received but I'm giving this product 3 stars because of mislabeling. When I review my order and click the link associated with this portion of my order, it takes me to a page advertising the same product "1 ounce (Pack of 2)" but for almost $30...Seems the labeling is mixed up or something.
customer_reviews.author: Will Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I somehow acquired athlete foot on an ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I somehow acquired athlete foot on an oversea trip. This cured it completely in a few days.A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Got this perscribed from Doc after month long blister problems from intense gym cardio workouts. It solved my problems. Also gabe it to my dad and it cured all the issues he had from year lomg marathons and jogging. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Californiansunshine

customer_reviews.title: what a great price on Amazon for the 1 ounce (Pack of ...
customer_reviews.text: There's no question that Lamisil works, but also: what a great price on Amazon for the 1 ounce (Pack of 2): you're getting 2oz of the product for about half of the best "on-sale" price of any other retailer I've checked. I just hope this is not some kind of labeling error, because their next size up reads "2 Pack (2 ounce total)", and is sold for $49.99, which just doesn't add up.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really have worked! I just had a small bit of athletes foot as determined by my dermatologist, but I was consistent with the application and it went away pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: anti-fungal cream
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. Doctor recommenced it for athletics foot I have by my knee (random, yes. Doctor said I probably got it in the garden.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dermatologist. Easy to apply. And, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Very quickly helped my athlete's foot clear up. It also was recommended by my dermatologist. It's also very easy to apply - just make sure to wash your hands afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a trusted name-brand OTC medicine. Works as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to see the result, but overall not a bad product

customer_reviews.text: I used them and it didn’t work and I eventually had my podiatrist give me a prescription to use to clear up my feet

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be the penicillin of antifungal creams.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Won't cure toe nails that lift off, but daily application will halt the progression of the detachment towards the base. I'm not risking my liver with the internal medicine approach so this is the best remedy I've found. When vacationing in Baja Mexico wear flip flops in the shower!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: If getting results is the game, this is not the name.
customer_reviews.author: John Lipka

customer_reviews.title: Gone in one day
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for ringworm fungus. Just one day and GONE. Of course that was my experience. You may take a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product for the price it is. I really recommend purchasing it, you will see results fast!
customer_reviews.author: David Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The Cream Helps Condition My Toenails As They Grow Out
customer_reviews.text: A podiatrist told me to use this for my toenail fungus. I also take Lamisil tablets. I also bought the spray which was all they sold in my local drug store. I like this better as I feel it conditions the toe nail as it is growing out. Getting rid of toenail fungus is a long term deal.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Price for 6 Tubes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. Compare what you would pay for six tubes at a local chain drug store. Especially if you need long term daily treatment, this is how you should buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nystatin
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a huge fungal infection due to chemotherapy. Even the prescription Nystatin wasn't working. Lamisil worked, within a couple of days, the infection was cleared.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leitner

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to tell whether this product got rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell whether this product got rid of my athelets's foot, because before I used this product, I had used CVS cream for a while. But it is cheap.

product_meta.title: Lamisil Athelete's Foot Antifungal Cream, Full Prescription Strength for Itching, Burning, Cracking, and Scaling, 1 ounce (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
Lamisil AT Antifungal Relief Cream is proven to cure most athlete's foot with one week of treatment*. Prescription strength LamisilAT relieves your symptoms and kills the fungus that causes athlete's foot. Athlete's foot is a contagious fungal infection. It is caused by a certain kind of fungi that love warm, moist conditions (like in your boots or shoes). Here's what you need to know:Athlete's foot causes itchy, dry, cracking skin on the foot (but symptoms vary). Athlete's foot affects 1 in 5 people. Athlete's foot can be cured with antifungal treatments like Lamisil AT Antifungal Relief Cream. Everyone is susceptible to athlete's foot, not just athletes. LamisilAT is proven to cure most athlete's foot between the toes with 1 week of treatment.* 
*When used as directed for the treatment of athlete's foot between the toes.
feature_bullets: Proven to cure most athlete's foot between the toes with one week of treatment** **When used as directed for the treatment of athlete's foot between the toes.
LamisilAT treats Athlete's Foot 4X Faster Than a Leading Brand.**Based on 2016 Retail Sales Data. For Athlete's Foot between the toes
Relieves itching, burning, cracking and scaling symptoms caused by athlete's foot
Full prescription strength Terbinafine Hydrochloride Cream 1% Antifungal Cream
